spanish_language.title: Ejercicio 1: plátanos
spanish_language.description_game: En este ejercicio aprenderemos los conceptos básicos. Para ello, colocaremos un único plátano en el plato arrastrando el bloque azul al área blanca. ¡Vamos allá!
spanish_language.wrong: Uh! ¿Estás seguro de haber colocado solo un plátano?

english_language.title: Exercise 1: bananas
english_language.description_game: In this exercise we will learn the basic concepts. For that, we will put only one banana in the dish dragging the blue block to the white area. Let's go!
english_language.correct: Well done! Are you ready for the next exercise?
english_language.wrong: Uh! Are you sure that there is only one banana?
